name: Clip Ins
description:
Glam Goddess Hair  extensions are of the highest quality and have 100% natural extra soft and fine hair.  You can wear it straight, roller set or curl with curling iron to give it an extra bounce and body. These extensions will also last longer than most clip-in hair extensions. 

Can be purchased in
 Brazilian (Body Wave, Deep Wave ,straight),
 Malaysian (body wave, loose wave, straight), 
Peruvian (body wave, loose wave, deep wave, straight).

Details:

100% Human Indian Remy hair extensions (highest quality hair)
Can be washed, heat styled and colored.

name: Layaway
description:
Layaway is available.

1/2 of the payment is due upon ordering. You have 3 weeks to pay the total balance. If you cancel your order FOR ANY REASON there is a $50.00 cancellation fee.

To take advantage of this deal total up your order and email customer service at glamgoddesshair@yahoo.com with the total. An invoice will be sent with the layaway details specific to your order.

name: Glam Goddess Brazilian Body Wave 10"
description:
Origin
 Brazil

Color selection
Glam Goddess hair ranges from a 1 to a 1b the hair is virgin or unprocessed and this is the natural color. However we have a color specialist that can customize your hair and dye it any color.

Suggested Amount 
All of our bundles are approximately 3.5 - 3.8 oz, 2 or more bundles are needed for a whole head depending on your preference.

Product Life
Glam Goddess Hair Last's up to 12mths


Can hair be straightened?

Glam Goddess hair can also be worn straight by applying a flat iron or blow dryer. 

Shipping time is 7 to 10 business day’s due to high demand.

 Refunds will not be issued for dissatisfaction with texture, color, issues with natural tapering, split ends, or concerns that are typical of a natural human hair product.
